item.title: FITS v8.4.0
item.description: • Added: Policy template generation system: Complete workflow from intake questionnaire to final policy export • Added: AI-powered content generation: Industry-specific policy content generation with user context injection • Added: Intake questionnaire: User context collection system capturing regulatory requirements, technical environment, and risk tolerance before generation • Added: Review workflow: Comprehensive review interface with approve, edit, and reject functionality for generated content • Added: Live client-side search: Real-time search with highlighting in policy review list • Added: Export functionality: DOCX and PDF export with improved table of contents and domain heading support • Added: WebSocket integration: Real-time progress updates during policy generation • Added: Modular architecture: Refactored codebase into focused files under 100 lines for better maintainability • Changed: Policy template generation workflow: Improved navigation and status display throughout the generation process • Changed: Form handler integration: Unified form handling across policy template views • Changed: Export service: Enhanced TOC generation and temporary file management utilities

item.title: FITS v8.3.9
item.description: • Changed: Removed legacy ADMIN role; system now uses only SUPER_ADMIN, TENANT_ADMIN, and USER roles • Fixed: Fixed 404 error on Excel template download for tenant admin users • Fixed: Removed obsolete `/v2/` URL prefix checks from authentication middleware • Fixed: Updated organization URL pattern matching in middleware to match current URL configuration • Fixed: Replaced PII email logging with non-PII identifiers (user ID or hashed email) in orphaned session handler • Fixed: Removed password change restriction for tenant admins; password changes are now allowed as security best practice • Fixed: Replaced naive datetime. • Fixed: Fixed user self-edit validation to compare UIDs instead of object references in tenant scoping middleware • Fixed: Fixed DigitalOcean deploy scripts token handling + DNS preflight checks to support trusted SSL issuance per droplet subdomain

item.title: FITS v8.3.0
item.description: • Fixed: Azure OAuth redirect URI: Fixed incorrect redirect URI detection that prevented Azure OAuth from working properly - now correctly detects IP or domain • Fixed: Azure OAuth refresh tokens: Fixed missing refresh tokens by adding required offline_access scope, allowing long-lived sessions • Fixed: Super admin user management: Fixed user edit redirects and user list display so super admins can properly manage users across tenants • Fixed: Duplicate email sending: Fixed issue where clicking test email sent two emails instead of one • Fixed: Transformers cache warning: Fixed deprecation warning that appeared during startup • Added: Test email functionality: Email provider detail pages now have "Send Test Email" button that sends actual test emails to tenant admin for verification • Added: Gmail email sending: Gmail provider now actually sends emails via Gmail API (previously returned success without sending) • Added: Exchange email sending: Exchange provider now sends emails via Exchange API (previously returned success without sending) • Added: Centralized user URLs: User navigation now uses role-based redirect logic for better user experience • Changed: Unified OAuth workflow: Removed separate "Connect" buttons - creating a provider now automatically initiates OAuth flow for simpler setup • Changed: Azure setup guide: Now dynamically displays the correct redirect URI based on current host, making setup easier • Changed: Email provider documentation: Updated to reflect the simplified OAuth workflow

item.title: FITS v8.2.2
item.description: • Added: User-selectable main project: Dashboard users can now choose which project to display as their main project for personalized views • Added: Improved dashboard performance: Dashboard now loads significantly faster with optimized data retrieval • Changed: Dashboard query optimization: Eliminated performance bottlenecks that caused slow dashboard loading times • Changed: Enhanced dashboard caching: Better data organization reduces redundant queries and improves response times

item.title: FITS v8.2.1
item.description: • Fixed: Scope publishing bug: Fixed critical issue where scopes with the same name in different projects could be published to the wrong project's Confluence space • Fixed: Scope page identification: Scope pages now include project name in title to ensure unique identification and prevent cross-project confusion

item.title: FITS v8.2.0
item.description: • Changed: Project unpublish validation: Unpublish button now properly checks for blocking relationships (assessments, templates) before allowing unpublish • Changed: Project detail view improvements: Better organization of project detail page components for improved usability • Fixed: Error logging consistency: Project operations now have consistent error logging for easier troubleshooting • Fixed: Project update error handling: Improved error messages and handling when project updates fail • Added: Project deletion safety checks: System now prevents deleting projects that have scopes with assessments or assessment templates, preventing data loss • Added: Enhanced project deletion: Two-step confirmation process for Confluence page deletion to prevent accidental data loss • Added: Confluence page management: System now checks if Confluence pages exist before deletion and provides better feedback • Added: Improved delete workflow: Better validation and user feedback throughout the project deletion process
